description: Have you ever wanted to become a more confident writer or performer? Are you bursting with creativity? This is the course for you! Appropriate for serious youth and adults interested in creative arts such as writing, theater, music, and film. Learn proven techniques to sharpen your writing skills so that you can ace your next standardized writing exam. Write your own script, and adapt it for the stage or film. Learn to sing like a pro and open your voice to sound like any singer on the radio. This course is created by a seasoned professional and national award-winning public speaker, vocalist, trombonist, and former high school English teacher. You will learn from the best, and walk away as a winner in every area of your life, plus gain maximum confidence in your ability as an artist.
title: Wright Arts Camp: The Curriculum
